title: 51: A Queer Discussion
itunes:title: 51: A Queer Discussion
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: Some sexual abuse and violence towards the Queer community is discussed) The Broads are joined by Valerie Franco, Torii Wolf, and Lee Dawn Hershey to talk all about their experiences as part of the LGBTQIA+ community, the fluidity of sexuality, growing up queer, pronouns, Pride month, and more! Oh, and you'll also get to hear baby Ruthie shout for joy for the first few minutes!
Joined by:
Valerie Franco @seevaldrum
Torii Wolf: @toriiwolf
Lee Dawn Hershey: @leedawnhershey
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced @thebluemediaroom www.thebluemediaroom.com (http://www.thebluemediaroom.com/)
*** FIRST LEAF: Just go to http://tryfirstleaf.com/CHATTY for 6 bottles of wine for only $29.95 plus free shipping!
*** LOLA: For 40% off all subscriptions, visit mylola.com (http://mylola.com/) and enter CHATTY when you subscribe!
*** BEAUTY BY DESIGN: Use promo code CHATTY at BEAUTY BY DESIGN.com/CHATTY (http://design.com/CHATTY) for 20% off

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
